mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_COMM.NEXTVAL, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 200, 20, 400, 10, null )
mapper.select: SELECT B.CBOARD_NO, B.CBOARD_TITLE, B.CBOARD_VIEWCNT, B.CBOARD_DATE, R.REPLYCNT, U.USER_ID FROM BOARD_COMM B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CBOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS REPLYCNT FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY GROUP BY CBOARD_NO ) R ON B.CBOARD_NO = R.CBOARD_NO LEFT JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE B.COMM_BIG=200 AND B.COMM_MID = 20 ORDER BY B.CBOARD_NO DESC
SELECT B.*, U.USER_ID FROM BOARD_COMM B,USERS U WHERE B.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no} AND B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO
